About

Let me introduce myself.

"Hi! My name is João Victor and I'm 27 years old. I was born in Brazil, in the beautiful city of Maceio, but for the past 2 years I've been living and working at Salvador. I've been working as Robotics Engineer in some exciting projects at the Brazilian Institute of Robotics (BIR), located inside SENAI CIMATEC, which is a respectful R&D institute with cases of success that reached the market. I'm passionate about Robotics and I'm always looking for new challenges to face."

Profile

BSc in Computer Engineering at Universidade Federal de Alagoas, Brazil. Robotics Engineer focused on Mobile Robots and Autonomous Systems development since 2018.

Skills

In my day to day work, I'm strongly involved with ROS and C++ development, by implementing a high level component for simulation, in stacks like navigation, SLAM or control, and sometimes by implementing some driver to connect with an external device. I'm always learning something new. I've been in contact with ROS2 since the end of 2018 and currently, I'm expanding my knowledge in the framework trying to contribute with the community as good as possible.
